Function Documentation

int lov_merge_lvb_kms ( struct lov_stripe_md *  lsm,
struct ost_lvb *  lvb,
__u64 *  kms_place 
)

Merge the lock value block(&lvb) attributes and KMS from each of the stripes in a file into a single lvb.

It is expected that the caller initializes the current atime, mtime, ctime to avoid regressing a more uptodate time on the local client.

Definition at line 49 of file lov_merge.c.
